insert.Name: setFeeDescriptionAfterPayment
insert.Script:
/* This is update the fee_collection_transaction table with the FeeDescription for a corresponding payment */
UPDATE fee_collection_transaction SET Description = f.Description, FeeTypeID = f.FeeTypeID, FeeType = zft.FeeType --select distinct fct.*, f.Description, f.FeeTypeID from fee_collection_transaction fct INNER JOIN Fees f on f.FeeID = fct.FeeID INNER JOIN student_fees sf ON SF.FeeID = F.FeeID AND sf.FeeTypeID = f.FeeTypeID INNER JOIN Person p ON p.PersonID = fct.PersonID LEFT JOIN zlkpFeeType zft ON zft.FeeTypeID = f.FeeTypeID where f.FeeID = @FeeID and p.PersonID = @PersonID

The Finance Planning Workbench provides an overview of the financial status whilst showing essential data including income, expenses, investments and cashflow information.
The Finance Planning Workbench provides an overview of the financial status showing data including income, expenses, investments and cashflow information.

businessRules.rule: set @BusinessRules_EnableResultSet = 1 -- Enable caching of the result set. Duration is specified in seconds. -- set @BusinessRules_ResultSetCacheDuration = 30

SELECT [TransactionID] ,[BudgetID] ,BudgetName ,[Category] ,[Description] ,[Date] ,[RecordTypeID] ,[CreatedDate] ,[ModifiedDate] ,[CreatedBy] ,[ModifiedBy] ,[Income] ,[Expense] FROM ( SELECT iet.[TransactionID] ,iet.[BudgetID] ,iet.[Amount] ,iet.[Category] ,iet.[Description] ,iet.[Date] ,iet.[RecordTypeID] ,iet.[CreatedDate] ,iet.[ModifiedDate] ,iet.[CreatedBy] ,iet.[ModifiedBy] ,CASE WHEN [Type] = 'Income' THEN [Amount] END AS [Income] ,CASE WHEN [Type] = 'Expense' THEN [Amount] END AS [Expense] ,b.BudgetName FROM [IncomeExpenseTransactions] iet LEFT JOIN Budget b on b.BudgetID = iet.BudgetID ) AS PivotData

command.text: SELECT [TransactionID] ,[BudgetID] ,BudgetName ,[Category] ,[Description] ,[Date] ,[RecordTypeID] ,[CreatedDate] ,[ModifiedDate] ,[CreatedBy] ,[ModifiedBy] ,[Income] ,[Expense] FROM ( SELECT iet.[TransactionID] ,iet.[BudgetID] ,iet.[Amount] ,iet.[Category] ,iet.[Description] ,iet.[Date] ,iet.[RecordTypeID] ,iet.[CreatedDate] ,iet.[ModifiedDate] ,iet.[CreatedBy] ,iet.[ModifiedBy] ,CASE WHEN [Type] = 'Income' THEN [Amount] END AS [Income] ,CASE WHEN [Type] = 'Expense' THEN [Amount] END AS [Expense] ,b.BudgetName FROM [IncomeExpenseTransactions] iet LEFT JOIN Budget b on b.BudgetID = iet.BudgetID ) AS PivotData

insert.Name: sendLogicUserInCurrentSession
insert.Script:
SET @BusinessRules_Whitelist = 'Empty' if @Arguments_CommandName = 'Insert'
SET @BusinessRules_Whitelist = @BusinessRules_Whitelist + 'SendAdminEmail'
SELECT @Session_GradeBookTitle = GradeBookTitle FROM GradeBookEntry WHERE GradeBookEntryID = @GradeBookEntryID
-- find the email address of the current user SELECT @Session_EmailAddress = m.Email from aspnet_Membership m inner join aspnet_Users u on m.UserId = u.UserId where u.UserName = @BusinessRules_UserName

insert.Data:
/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN UPDATE SET tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.SubmittedDate ,tgt.Weight = src.WeightMultiplier ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.MaxScore ,tgt.extIsActiveSession = src.extIsActiveSession ,tgt.[extActiveCourseSection] = src.[ActiveCourseSection] ,tgt.extIsCSY = CASE WHEN src.extIsActiveSession = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.[AssessmentCategoryID] = src.[AssessmentCategoryID] ,tgt.[AssessmentCategory] = src.[AssessmentCategory] ,tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = src.[GradingPeriodID] ,tgt.[UserID] = src.[UserID] ,tgt.[CreatedBy] = src.[CreatedBy] ,tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE() ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBy ,tgt.extCalendarSessionID = src.CalendarSessionID ,tgt.[GlobalID] = [src].[GlobalID] ,tgt.AssessmentFamilyID = src.AssessmentFamilyID ,tgt.AssessmentFamily = src.AssessmentFamily ,tgt.PublishItem = src.PublishItem ,tgt.PostToFamilyAccess = src.PostToFamilyAccess ,tgt.PostToStudentAccess = src.PostToStudentAccess ,tgt.PublishResults = src.PublishResults ,tgt.Adaptive = src.Adaptive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN INSERT (StudentCourseSectionID, SubmittedDate, GradeBookEntryID, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, GradeBookEntryTypeID, Weight, extMaxScore, UserID, extIsActiveSession, extActiveCourseSection, extIsCSY, [RefSchoolStreamID], [AssessmentCategoryID], [AssessmentCategory], [CreatedBy], [ModifiedBy], [GradingPeriodID], GlobalID, extCalendarSessionID,AssessmentFamilyID, AssessmentFamily, PublishItem, PostToFamilyAccess, PublishResults, Adaptive, PostToStudentAccess) VALUES (src.StudentCourseSectionID, COALESCE(src.Submitteddate, GETDATE()), src.GradeBookEntryID, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), src.GradeBookEntryTypeID, src.WeightMultiplier, src.MaxScore, src.UserID, src.extIsActiveSession, src.ActiveCourseSection, 1, src.RefSchoolStreamID, [src].[AssessmentCategoryID], src.[AssessmentCategory], [src].[CreatedBy], [src].[ModifiedBy], [src].[GradingPeriodID], src.GlobalID,src.[CalendarSessionID], src.AssessmentFamilyID, src.AssessmentFamily, src.PublishItem, src.PostToFamilyAccess, src.PublishResults, src.Adaptive, src.PostToStudentAccess)
OUTPUT $action, inserted.*, deleted.*; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Student scoresheets have been successfully prepared'
insert.Confirmation: You are about to prepare the scoresheet for the selected GBA entry. Proceed only when your scores are ready. Do you want to continue ?

update.Data: /* Date : 20th Sept 2019 Desc : This statement removes the GradebookEntry record and its associated child StudentGradeBookEntry */ delete from StudentGradeBookEntry where GradeBookEntryID = @GradeBookEntryID delete from GradeBookEntry where GradeBookEntryID = @GradeBookEntryID SET @Result_Refresh = 1 SET @Result_ShowMessage = @GradeBook + ' and its associated child records ' + 'has been removed successfully'

/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN UPDATE SET tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.SubmittedDate ,tgt.Weight = src.WeightMultiplier ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.MaxScore ,tgt.extIsActiveSession = src.extIsActiveSession ,tgt.[extActiveCourseSection] = src.[ActiveCourseSection] ,tgt.extIsCSY = CASE WHEN src.extIsActiveSession = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.[AssessmentCategoryID] = src.[AssessmentCategoryID] ,tgt.[AssessmentCategory] = src.[AssessmentCategory] ,tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = src.[GradingPeriodID] ,tgt.[UserID] = src.[UserID] ,tgt.[CreatedBy] = src.[CreatedBy] ,tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE() ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBy ,tgt.extCalendarSessionID = src.CalendarSessionID ,tgt.[GlobalID] = [src].[GlobalID] ,tgt.AssessmentFamilyID = src.AssessmentFamilyID ,tgt.AssessmentFamily = src.AssessmentFamily ,tgt.PublishItem = src.PublishItem ,tgt.PostToFamilyAccess = src.PostToFamilyAccess ,tgt.PostToStudentAccess = src.PostToStudentAccess ,tgt.PublishResults = src.PublishResults ,tgt.Adaptive = src.Adaptive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN INSERT (StudentCourseSectionID, SubmittedDate, GradeBookEntryID, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, GradeBookEntryTypeID, Weight, extMaxScore, UserID, extIsActiveSession, extActiveCourseSection, extIsCSY, [RefSchoolStreamID], [AssessmentCategoryID], [AssessmentCategory], [CreatedBy], [ModifiedBy], [GradingPeriodID], GlobalID, extCalendarSessionID,AssessmentFamilyID, AssessmentFamily, PublishItem, PostToFamilyAccess, PublishResults, Adaptive, PostToStudentAccess) VALUES (src.StudentCourseSectionID, COALESCE(src.Submitteddate, GETDATE()), src.GradeBookEntryID, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), src.GradeBookEntryTypeID, src.WeightMultiplier, src.MaxScore, src.UserID, src.extIsActiveSession, src.ActiveCourseSection, 1, src.RefSchoolStreamID, [src].[AssessmentCategoryID], src.[AssessmentCategory], [src].[CreatedBy], [src].[ModifiedBy], [src].[GradingPeriodID], src.GlobalID,src.[CalendarSessionID], src.AssessmentFamilyID, src.AssessmentFamily, src.PublishItem, src.PostToFamilyAccess, src.PublishResults, src.Adaptive, src.PostToStudentAccess)
OUTPUT $action, inserted.*, deleted.*; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Student scoresheets have been successfully prepared'

/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN UPDATE SET tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.SubmittedDate ,tgt.Weight = src.WeightMultiplier ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.MaxScore ,tgt.extIsActiveSession = src.extIsActiveSession ,tgt.[extActiveCourseSection] = src.[ActiveCourseSection] ,tgt.extIsCSY = CASE WHEN src.extIsActiveSession = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.[AssessmentCategoryID] = src.[AssessmentCategoryID] ,tgt.[AssessmentCategory] = src.[AssessmentCategory] ,tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = src.[GradingPeriodID] ,tgt.[UserID] = src.[UserID] ,tgt.[CreatedBy] = src.[CreatedBy] ,tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE() ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBy ,tgt.extCalendarSessionID = src.CalendarSessionID ,tgt.[GlobalID] = [src].[GlobalID] ,tgt.AssessmentFamilyID = src.AssessmentFamilyID ,tgt.AssessmentFamily = src.AssessmentFamily ,tgt.PublishItem = src.PublishItem ,tgt.PostToFamilyAccess = src.PostToFamilyAccess ,tgt.PostToStudentAccess = src.PostToStudentAccess ,tgt.PublishResults = src.PublishResults ,tgt.Adaptive = src.Adaptive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN INSERT (StudentCourseSectionID, SubmittedDate, GradeBookEntryID, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, GradeBookEntryTypeID, Weight, extMaxScore, UserID, extIsActiveSession, extActiveCourseSection, extIsCSY, [RefSchoolStreamID], [AssessmentCategoryID], [AssessmentCategory], [CreatedBy], [ModifiedBy], [GradingPeriodID], GlobalID, extCalendarSessionID,AssessmentFamilyID, AssessmentFamily, PublishItem, PostToFamilyAccess, PublishResults, Adaptive, PostToStudentAccess) VALUES (src.StudentCourseSectionID, COALESCE(src.Submitteddate, GETDATE()), src.GradeBookEntryID, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), src.GradeBookEntryTypeID, src.WeightMultiplier, src.MaxScore, src.UserID, src.extIsActiveSession, src.ActiveCourseSection, 1, src.RefSchoolStreamID, [src].[AssessmentCategoryID], src.[AssessmentCategory], [src].[CreatedBy], [src].[ModifiedBy], [src].[GradingPeriodID], src.GlobalID,src.[CalendarSessionID], src.AssessmentFamilyID, src.AssessmentFamily, src.PublishItem, src.PostToFamilyAccess, src.PublishResults, src.Adaptive, src.PostToStudentAccess)
OUTPUT $action, inserted.*, deleted.*; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Student scoresheets have been successfully prepared'

/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src

WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID

command.text:
/*
DATE : 12 March 2020 Modification : Redefined the logic that determines a current student to WHERE ssa.ExitWithdrawDate IS NULL OR ssa.ExitWithdrawDate >= GETDATE() AND r.RoleName IN ('Student')
*/
SELECT p.PersonID ,P.FirstName + ' ' + P.LastName AS StudentName ,P.FirstName + ' ' + P.LastName + ' ( ' + gl.description + ' )' AS StudentGradeName ,r.RoleName , COALESCE(T.Description, '') + ' ' + P.LastName AS StudentNameTitle ,gl.Description AS GradeLevel ,gl.SortOrder FROM Person p INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON opr.PersonID = P.PersonID INNER JOIN StudentSchoolAssociation ssa ON opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID = ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID INNER JOIN Session s ON ssa.CalendarSessionID = s.CalendarSessionID INNER JOIN Calendar c ON s.OrganizationCalendarID = c.OrganizationCalendarId LEFT JOIN zlkpGradeLevel gl ON ssa.RefEntryGradeLevelId = gl.RefGradeLevelId LEFT JOIN zlkpRole r ON opr.RoleID = r.RoleId LEFT JOIN zlkpTitle t ON p.TitleID = t.TitleID -- WHERE r.RoleName IN ('Student') AND c.CurrentSchoolYear = 1
WHERE ssa.ExitWithdrawDate IS NULL OR ssa.ExitWithdrawDate >= GETDATE() AND r.RoleName IN ('Student')

SELECT p.PersonID ,P.FirstName + ' ' + P.LastName AS Staffname ,r.RoleName , T.Description + ', ' + P.LastName AS StaffNameTitle
FROM
Person p INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON opr.PersonID = P.PersonID LEFT JOIN zlkpRole r ON opr.RoleID = r.RoleId LEFT JOIN zlkpTitle t ON p.TitleID = t.TitleID
where r.RoleName IN ('Staff', 'Teacher') AND GETDATE() BETWEEN p.ExtendedLiveStatusStartDate AND p.ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate

SELECT opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID ,opr.RoleID ,zr.RoleName ,opr.OrganisationID ,o.Name OrganisationName ,opr.PersonID ,p.LastName ,p.FirstName ,StaffName = P.[FirstName] + ' ' + [p].[LastName] ,opr.EntryDate ,opr.ExitDate FROM dbo.OrganizationPersonRole opr LEFT JOIN dbo.Organisation o ON opr.OrganisationID = o.OrganizationID LEFT JOIN dbo.Person p ON opr.PersonID = p.PersonID LEFT JOIN dbo.zlkpRole zr ON opr.RoleID = zr.RoleID WHERE zr.RoleName IN ('staff')

SELECT P.PersonID ,FirstName + ', ' + LastName + '( ' + t.Description + ' )' AS GuardianName
FROM Person p LEFT JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON p.PersonID = opr.PersonId LEFT JOIN zlkpRole r ON opr.RoleID = r.RoleId LEFT JOIN zlkpTitle t ON p.TitleID = t.TitleID LEFT JOIN Organisation o ON opr.OrganisationID = o.OrganizationID where r.RoleName IN ('Parent') AND GETDATE() BETWEEN p.ExtendedLiveStatusStartDate AND p.ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate

select "Person"."PersonID" "PersonID" ,"Person"."IdentificationCode" "IdentificationCode" ,"Person"."FirstName" "FirstName" ,"Person"."MiddleName" "MiddleName" ,"Person"."LastName" "LastName" ,"Person"."TitleID" "TitleID" ,"Title"."Description" "TitleDescription" ,"Person"."extSetGradeLevel" "ExtSetGradeLevel" from "dbo"."Person" "Person" left join "dbo"."zlkpTitle" "Title" on "Person"."TitleID" = "Title"."TitleID" where Person.ExtendedRole = 'Parent'

command.text:
/* Modified : Added condition to cater for student who enrolled in current academic year but might have been withdrwan so that they do not appear in the attendance list after applying the ATP process. (ExitWithdrawDate IS NULL OR ExitWithdrawDate >= GETDATE()) Modified : 04 Oct 2019 */
SELECT opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID ,p.FirstName + ' ' + p.LastName AS FullName ,p.FirstName + ' ' + p.LastName + ' (' + zgl.Description + ')' as StudentGradeName ,zgl.Description as GradeLevel ,ssa.EnrolledDate ,cal.CurrentSchoolYear as CSY ,cal.CalendarDescription as CalCode ,zgl.SortOrder from OrganizationPersonRole opr INNER JOIN PERSON p on opr.PersonID = p.PersonID INNER JOIN dbo.StudentSchoolAssociation ssa ON ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID = opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID INNER JOIN dbo.Session sn ON ssa.CalendarSessionID = sn.CalendarSessionID INNER JOIN dbo.Calendar cal ON sn.OrganizationCalendarID = cal.OrganizationCalendarID LEFT JOIN dbo.zlkpGradeLevel zgl ON ssa.RefEntryGradeLevelId = zgl.RefGradeLevelId LEFT JOIN zlkpRole zr on zr.RoleId = opr.RoleID where CurrentSchoolYear = 1 and zr.RoleName IN ('STUDENT') AND (ExitWithdrawDate IS NULL OR ExitWithdrawDate >= GETDATE())

update.Data:
UPDATE opr SET ExitDate = ssa.ExitWithdrawDate FROM OrganizationPersonRole OPR INNER JOIN StudentSchoolAssociation ssa on opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID = opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID INNER JOIN Person P ON P.PersonID = OPR.PersonID INNER JOIN zlkpRole zr on zr.RoleId = opr.RoleID WHERE SSA.ExitWithdrawDate <= GETDATE() AND zr.RoleName in ('Student') AND ssa.StudentEnrollmentID = @StudentEnrollmentID
-- UPDATE PERSON ENDDATES UPDATE P SET ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate , CurrentYearStatus = 'No' from Person p left join OrganizationPersonRole opr on opr.PersonID = p.PersonID left join zlkpRole zr on zr.RoleId = opr.RoleID where zr.RoleName in ('Student') and opr.ExitDate <= GETDATE()

insert.Data:
/* Date : 28th May 2019 Name : [dbo].[usp_merge_automate_class_section_rosters] Description : This sql script forms part of the process to automate the assignment of students to course sections (class) A prior process creates the view vw_merge_student_coursesections which is used used to update StudentSectionAssociation table Abnormal Assignment Occurrence : Check to ensure the codes for absence RefCourseSectionEnrollmentStatusTypeId is equal to 8 Modified : 02 September 2019 -- added script to refresh child records on update Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu version Date Desc Author -- 0.2 20/03/2021 tgt.RefSchoolStreamID = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] Benjamin Ohene-Adu -- 0.3 13/06/2021 Added CourseSectionID to capture changes in setup Benjamin Ohene-Adu
-- EXEC [dbo].[usp_merge_automate_class_section_rosters] --SELECT * FROM StudentSectionAssociation tgt */
EXEC [dbo].[usp_merge_automate_class_section_rosters]
SET @Result_ExecuteOnClient = '$appfactory.find("StudentClassSections", "Controller").sync();' SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The matching process for students ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully'
insert.Confirmation: This action would assign students to their respective classes. Do you want to continue ?

update.Data:
/* Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 15th September 2021 Version Desc -- 0.1 This task is to remove mismatched StudentCourseSection where the grade level does not match CourseSection */
delete sgbe FROM dbo.StudentGradeBookEntry sgbe where sgbe.StudentCourseSectionID = @StudentCourseSectionID
delete g from dbo.Grade g where g.StudentCourseSectionID = @StudentCourseSectionID
delete slo from dbo.StudentLearningObjective slo where slo.StudentCourseSectionID = @StudentCourseSectionID
delete ssa from dbo.StudentSectionAssociation ssa where StudentCourseSectionID = @StudentCourseSectionID

insert.Name: setItemCode
insert.Script:
/* Author : Benjamon Ohene-Adu Date : 08 March 2021 Desc : Populates the ItemCode fields using the lookup from the Performance Indicator table
*/
UPDATE lo SET [ItemCode] = pi.[Code] , Indicator = CONCAT(pi.CODE, '-', pi.extSubject,' - ', PI.PerformanceDescription), ContentDescription = pi.SuccessStatement
FROM [LearningObjective] [lo] INNER JOIN [PerformanceIndicator] [pi] ON [lo].[PerformanceIndicatorID] = [pi].[PerformanceIndicatorID] WHERE [lo].[PerformanceIndicatorID] = @PerformanceIndicatorID

insert.Name: setOwnerAssignment
insert.Script:
-- Revised Date : 23rd Feb 2020 -- First set the username to the data entry person SET @CreatedBy = @BusinessRules_UserName -- if the Owner field is not selected or filled up then set that to current user IF (@Owner IS NULL) SET @Owner = @BusinessRules_UserName
-- Additional rule to set UserID SET @UserID = @BusinessRules_UserId

insert.Name: sendAssessmentNotificationOnCreation
insert.Script:
Host: mail.ntchosting.com Port: 25 UserName: b.adu@dekakis.com Password: nanakillo,1970 EnableSSL: false From: "Standard Based Plan Created" b.adu@dekakis.com To: {@BusinessRules_UserEmail} BCC: ben.aduohene@gmail.com Subject: Standard Based Plan for {ItemCode} in {SectionNo}
Thank you for creating {ItemCode} mastery assessment for {SectionNo} regarding indicator :{PerformanceDescription}. Please be reminded the schedule is as follows

Assessment Date Category Weight
 {ItemCode}  {AssessmentDate}  {Category}  {WeightMultiplier}%
     
Please be aware creating assessment plan ahead of schedule enhances your endeavour in informed teaching. Please do well to update your scoresheet as soon as assessment scores are available.
{SchoolName},
Subject Instructor,  {Owner}

insert.Name: sendAssessmentNotificationOnUpdate
insert.Script:
Host: mail.ntchosting.com Port: 25 UserName: b.adu@dekakis.com Password: nanakillo,1970 EnableSSL: false From: "Standards Based Plan Update" b.adu@dekakis.com To: {@BusinessRules_UserEmail}, ben.aduohene@gmail.com BCC: ben.aduohene@gmail.com Subject: Standards Based Plan for {ItemCode} in {SectionNo} {ItemCode} standards based plan has been updated for {SectionNo} students in {Stream}. Please be reminded the schedule is as follows

Assessment Date Wt Assessment Category
 {ItemCode}  {AssessmentDate}  {WeightMultiplier}%  {Category}
     
In this implementation the student should be able to {PerformanceDescription} Please do well to update your scoresheet as soon as assessment scores are available.
Head of Administration,
Created By {Owner},

insert.Name: blogic_buildSessionParameter
insert.Script:
SET @BusinessRules_Whitelist = 'Empty' if @Arguments_CommandName = 'Insert'
SET @BusinessRules_Whitelist = @BusinessRules_Whitelist + 'SendAdminEmail'
SELECT @Session_Indicator = Indicator FROM LearningObjective WHERE LearningObjectiveID = @LearningObjectiveID
-- find the email address of the current user SELECT @Session_EmailAddress = m.Email from aspnet_Membership m inner join aspnet_Users u on m.UserId = u.UserId where u.UserName = @BusinessRules_UserName

command.text:
select distinct csp.StudentName ,csp.YearGroup ,csp.GuardianName ,csp.HowRelated ,csp.ContactPoint ,csp.System ,csp.IsPrimary ,csp.Employer ,csp.Profession ,csp.LivesWith ,zas.Description ,ae.EventDate ,count(*) OVER (PARTITION BY csp.studentName) as 'Absences' ,zac.Description as AbsenceReason from StudentSectionAttendanceEvents ssae with (nowait) inner hash join AttendanceEvent ae on ae.AttendanceEventID = ssae.AttendanceEventID LEFT join vw_ops_current_student_and_parents csp on csp.OrganizationPersonRoleID = ssae.OrganizationPersonRoleID left join zlkpAttendanceStatus zas on zas.RefAttendanceStatusId = ssae.RefAttendanceStatusID
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[zlkpAbsentAttendanceCategory] zac on zac.RefAbsentAttendanceCategoryId = ssae.RefAbsentAttendanceCategoryId
where zas.Description <> ('Present')

update.FilterExpression: GETDATE() BETWEEN EntryDate AND ExitDate AND CYS <> 'No' AND Role = 'Student'

update.Data:
/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- Step 1 ================================================================================ -- Set the ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) for MarkedForDeletion = 1 --======================================================================================== UPDATE opr SET ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) --SELECT * FROM StudentSchoolAssociation ssa INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID = opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID WHERE ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 AND ssa.ExitWithdrawDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 2 ================================================================================ -- Set ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate for Person table --======================================================================================== UPDATE P SET ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate , CurrentYearStatus = 'No' -- SELECT * from Person p INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr on opr.PersonID = p.PersonID INNER JOIN zlkpRole zr on zr.RoleId = opr.RoleID INNER JOIN StudentSchoolAssociation ssa ON opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID = ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID where ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 and opr.ExitDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 3 ================================================================================== -- Reset the MarkedForDeletion Flag to 0 --========================================================================================== UPDATE StudentSchoolAssociation SET MarkedForDeletion = 0
/* Version Date : Description Author -- 0.1 18/09/2019 This process updates the current selected record and Benjamin Ohene-Adu updates the gradelevel, CurrentYearStatus and the ExtendedRole Benjamin Ohene-Adu -- 0.2 19/09/2019 This stage of the process updates the status of students with a current enrollment record CurrentYearGradeLevel, CurrentYearStatus and ExtendedRole */
-- Step 4 ================================================================================== -- Refresh the Person table and set the attributes for current students --========================================================================================== EXEC [zusp_harmonise_grade_level_groups] SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Update process for CYGs ' + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' ; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The students expiration process ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' SET @Result_Refresh = 1

/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- Step 1 ================================================================================ -- Set the ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) for MarkedForDeletion = 1 --======================================================================================== UPDATE opr SET ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) --SELECT * FROM StudentSchoolAssociation ssa INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID = opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID WHERE ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 AND ssa.ExitWithdrawDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 2 ================================================================================ -- Set ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate for Person table --======================================================================================== UPDATE P SET ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate , CurrentYearStatus = 'No' -- SELECT * from Person p INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr on opr.PersonID = p.PersonID INNER JOIN zlkpRole zr on zr.RoleId = opr.RoleID INNER JOIN StudentSchoolAssociation ssa ON opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID = ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID where ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 and opr.ExitDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 3 ================================================================================== -- Reset the MarkedForDeletion Flag to 0 --========================================================================================== UPDATE StudentSchoolAssociation SET MarkedForDeletion = 0
/* Version Date : Description Author -- 0.1 18/09/2019 This process updates the current selected record and Benjamin Ohene-Adu updates the gradelevel, CurrentYearStatus and the ExtendedRole Benjamin Ohene-Adu -- 0.2 19/09/2019 This stage of the process updates the status of students with a current enrollment record CurrentYearGradeLevel, CurrentYearStatus and ExtendedRole */
-- Step 4 ================================================================================== -- Refresh the Person table and set the attributes for current students --========================================================================================== EXEC [zusp_harmonise_grade_level_groups] SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Update process for CYGs ' + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' ; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The students expiration process ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' SET @Result_Refresh = 1

insert.Data:
-- First set the Calculated Partial Score and persist the value
update sgbe SET ExtPBSG = (EarnedScore / extMaxScore)*100 ,extPWS = (EarnedScore / ExtMaxScore) * Weight ,extOWS = SUM((EarnedScore / extMaxScore)*100)
from StudentLearningObjective sgbe WHERE sgbe.EarnedScore IS NOT NULL SET @Result_ExecuteOnClient = '$appfactory.find("StudentLearningObjective", "Controller").sync();' SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Partial Weighted Scores (PWS) records updated successfully.'

update.Data:
/* Date : 25th March 2020 Desc: This process intends to accummulate all historical scores. This would be used in the reporting suite of the application It is usefull in 1. Progress analysis of student performance per subject over time 2. Overall summative scores 3. Cummulative scores either by raw scores or %centages
*/
-- select * from master_student_learningobjective -- delete from master_student_learningobjective -- select * from LearningObjective
MERGE master_student_learningobjective tgt USING ( SELECT slo.*, pbc.PerformanceBaseConversion ,pbc.GradeName ,pbc.Passing ,pbc.Description ,pbc.AssessmentElementTypeID ,lob.PerformanceIndicatorID AS LSID ,lob.GradingPeriodID AS GPId ,lob.PublishItem ,lob.PublishResult ,lob.LearningObjectiveID AS LOBID
FROM StudentLearningObjective slo LEFT JOIN zlkpPerformanceBaseConversion pbc ON pbc.PerformanceBaseConversionID = slo.PerformanceBaseConversionID LEFT JOIN LearningObjective lob ON slo.LearningObjectiveID = lob.LearningObjectiveID WHERE lob.IsActive=1 AND lob.PublishResult=1 and Earnedscore IS Not Null )src ON tgt.MasterStudentLearningObjectiveID = src.StudentLearningObjectiveID
WHEN MATCHED AND ( src.EarnedScore <> tgt.EarnedScore OR src.Weight <> tgt.Weight OR src.DateFulfilled <> tgt.SubmittedDate OR src.ModifiedDate <> tgt.ModifiedDate OR src.extStatement <> tgt.extStatement OR src.LearningObjectiveEntryTypeID <> tgt.LearningObjectiveEntryTypeID OR src.PerformanceIndicatorID <> tgt.PerformanceIndicatorID OR src.ExtMaxScore <> tgt.ExtMaxScore OR src.GradingPeriodID <> tgt.GradingPeriodID OR src.FirstName <> tgt.FirstName OR src.LastName <> tgt.LastName OR src.IdentificationCode <> tgt.IdentificationCode OR src.extIsActiveSession <> tgt.extIsActiveSession OR src.extIsCSY <> tgt.extIsCSY ) THEN UPDATE SET tgt.LetterGrade = src.LetterGrade ,tgt.EarnedScore = src.EarnedScore ,tgt.Weight = src.Weight ,tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID ,tgt.LearningObjectiveEntryTypeID = src.LearningObjectiveEntryTypeID ,tgt.GradeTypeID = src.GradeTypeID ,tgt.GradingPeriodID = src.GPId ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.DateFulfilled ,tgt.PerformanceBaseConversionID = src.PerformanceBaseConversionID ,tgt.CreatedDate = src.CreatedDate ,tgt.ModifiedDate = src.ModifiedDate ,tgt.UserID = src.UserID ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.extMaxScore ,tgt.extStatement = src.extStatement ,tgt.PerformanceIndicatorID = src.PerformanceIndicatorID ,tgt.extPublishResult = src.PublishResult ,tgt.LearningObjectiveID = src.LOBID ,tgt.extRPM = (src.EarnedScore / src.extMaxScore)*100 ,tgt.extPWS = (src.EarnedScore * src.Weight) / (src.extMaxScore * 100) ,tgt.FirstName = src.FirstName ,tgt.LastName = src.LastName ,tgt.IdentificationCode = src.IdentificationCode ,tgt.CreatedBy = src.CreatedBy ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBY ,tgt.RefSchoolStreamID = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.IsActive = src.IsActive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET THEN INSERT ( MasterStudentLearningObjectiveID , LetterGrade , EarnedScore , Weight , StudentCourseSectionID , LearningObjectiveEntryTypeID , GradeTypeID , GradingPeriodID , SubmittedDate , PerformanceBaseConversionID , CreatedDate , ModifiedDate , UserID , extMaxScore , extStatement , extRPM , extPWS , PerformanceIndicatorID , extPublishResult , LearningObjectiveID , FirstName , LastName , IdentificationCode , CreatedBy , ModifiedBy , RefSchoolStreamID , IsActive ) VALUES (src.StudentLearningObjectiveID, src.LetterGrade, src.EarnedScore, src.Weight, src.StudentCourseSectionID, src.LearningObjectiveEntryTypeID, src.GradeTypeID, src.GradingPeriodID, src.DateFulfilled, src.PerformanceBaseConversionID, src.CreatedDate, src.ModifiedDate, src.UserID, src.extMaxScore ,src.extStatement ,((src.EarnedScore / src.extMaxScore)*100) ,(src.EarnedScore * src.Weight) / (src.extMaxScore * 100) ,src.PerformanceIndicatorID ,src.PublishResult ,src.LOBID ,SRC.FirstName ,src.LastName ,src.IdentificationCode ,src.CreatedBy ,src.ModifiedBy ,src.RefSchoolStreamID ,src.IsActive )
when not matched by source then delete ;
--SET @Result_ExecuteOnClient = '$appfactory.find("StudentLearningObjective", "Controller").sync();' SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'SBL Central grades have been updated successfully'

/* Date : 25th March 2020 Desc: This process intends to accummulate all historical scores. This would be used in the reporting suite of the application It is usefull in 1. Progress analysis of student performance per subject over time 2. Overall summative scores 3. Cummulative scores either by raw scores or %centages
*/
EXEC [dbo].[usp_merge_master_student_grades_learningobjectives_p4]
SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'SBL Central grades have been updated successfully'
EXEC [dbo].[usp_merge_master_student_grades_learningobjectives_p2]

/* Date : 25th March 2020 Desc: This process intends to accummulate all historical scores. This would be used in the reporting suite of the application It is usefull in 1. Progress analysis of student performance per subject over time 2. Overall summative scores 3. Cummulative scores either by raw scores or %centages
*/
EXEC usp_merge_master_student_grades_learningobjectives_P3 EXEC [dbo].[usp_merge_master_student_grades_learningobjectives_p4]
SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'SBL Central grades have been updated successfully'

-- First set the Calculated Partial Score and persist the value
update sgbe SET ExtPBSG = (EarnedScore / extMaxScore)*100 ,extPWS = (EarnedScore / ExtMaxScore) * Weight ,extOWS = SUM((EarnedScore / extMaxScore)*100) over (PARTITION BY StudentCourseSectionID)
from StudentLearningObjective sgbe WHERE sgbe.EarnedScore IS NOT NULL
SET @Result_ExecuteOnClient = '$appfactory.find("StudentLearningObjective", "Controller").sync();' SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Partial Weighted Scores (PWS) records updated successfully.'

-- First set the Calculated Partial Score and persist the value
update sgbe SET ExtPBSG = (EarnedScore / extMaxScore)*100 ,extPWS = (EarnedScore / ExtMaxScore) * Weight ,extOWS = SUM((EarnedScore / extMaxScore)*100) over (PARTITION BY StudentCourseSectionID)
from StudentLearningObjective sgbe WHERE sgbe.EarnedScore IS NOT NULL
SET @Result_ExecuteOnClient = '$appfactory.find("StudentLearningObjective", "Controller").sync();' SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Partial Weighted Scores (PWS) records updated successfully.'

--======================================================= -- update photos and organisation logo --========================================================= update m SET PhotoUrl = P.PhotoURL FROM master_student_grades_gradebooks_p4 m LEFT JOIN Person P ON P.PersonID = m.PersonID WHERE m.PhotoUrl IS NULL SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'updating student profile photos to central repo completed!!!'

update.Data:
/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- EXEC [dbo].[usp_ops_withdraw_students_enrollment]

/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- Step 1 ================================================================================ -- Set the ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) for MarkedForDeletion = 1 --======================================================================================== UPDATE opr SET ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) --SELECT * FROM StudentSchoolAssociation ssa INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID = opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID WHERE ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 AND ssa.ExitWithdrawDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 2 ================================================================================ -- Set ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate for Person table --======================================================================================== UPDATE P SET ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate , CurrentYearStatus = 'No' -- SELECT * from Person p INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr on opr.PersonID = p.PersonID INNER JOIN zlkpRole zr on zr.RoleId = opr.RoleID INNER JOIN StudentSchoolAssociation ssa ON opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID = ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID where ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 and opr.ExitDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 3 ================================================================================== -- Reset the MarkedForDeletion Flag to 0 --========================================================================================== UPDATE StudentSchoolAssociation SET MarkedForDeletion = 0
/* Version Date : Description Author -- 0.1 18/09/2019 This process updates the current selected record and Benjamin Ohene-Adu updates the gradelevel, CurrentYearStatus and the ExtendedRole Benjamin Ohene-Adu -- 0.2 19/09/2019 This stage of the process updates the status of students with a current enrollment record CurrentYearGradeLevel, CurrentYearStatus and ExtendedRole */
-- Step 4 ================================================================================== -- Refresh the Person table and set the attributes for current students --========================================================================================== EXEC [zusp_harmonise_grade_level_groups] SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Update process for CYGs ' + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' ; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The students expiration process ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' SET @Result_Refresh = 1

/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- Step 1 ================================================================================ -- Set the ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) for MarkedForDeletion = 1 --======================================================================================== UPDATE opr SET ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) --SELECT * FROM StudentSchoolAssociation ssa INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID = opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID WHERE ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 AND ssa.ExitWithdrawDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 2 ================================================================================ -- Set ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate for Person table --======================================================================================== UPDATE P SET ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate , CurrentYearStatus = 'No' -- SELECT * from Person p INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr on opr.PersonID = p.PersonID INNER JOIN zlkpRole zr on zr.RoleId = opr.RoleID INNER JOIN StudentSchoolAssociation ssa ON opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID = ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID where ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 and opr.ExitDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 3 ================================================================================== -- Reset the MarkedForDeletion Flag to 0 --========================================================================================== UPDATE StudentSchoolAssociation SET MarkedForDeletion = 0
/* Version Date : Description Author -- 0.1 18/09/2019 This process updates the current selected record and Benjamin Ohene-Adu updates the gradelevel, CurrentYearStatus and the ExtendedRole Benjamin Ohene-Adu -- 0.2 19/09/2019 This stage of the process updates the status of students with a current enrollment record CurrentYearGradeLevel, CurrentYearStatus and ExtendedRole */
-- Step 4 ================================================================================== -- Refresh the Person table and set the attributes for current students --========================================================================================== EXEC [zusp_harmonise_grade_level_groups] SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Update process for CYGs ' + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' ; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The students expiration process ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' SET @Result_Refresh = 1

/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- EXEC [dbo].[usp_ops_withdraw_students_enrollment]

/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- EXEC [dbo].[usp_ops_withdraw_students_enrollment]

IF @ExitDate IS NULL SET @ExitDate = DATEADD(YEAR, 10, GETDATE())

-- perform validation --DECLARE @ExitDate DATE IF @EntryDate IS NULL BEGIN SET @EntryDate = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) END
IF @ExitDate IS NULL BEGIN SET @ExitDate = DATEADD(YEAR, 12, GETDATE()) END

insert.Name: updateSGID
insert.Script: UPDATE sgbe SET extSGID = sgbe.StudentGradeBookEntryID from StudentGradeBookEntry sgbe where sgbe.extSGID IS NULL and extIsActiveSession = 1

update.Data:
/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN UPDATE SET tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.SubmittedDate ,tgt.Weight = src.WeightMultiplier ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.MaxScore ,tgt.extIsActiveSession = src.extIsActiveSession ,tgt.[extActiveCourseSection] = src.[ActiveCourseSection] ,tgt.extIsCSY = CASE WHEN src.extIsActiveSession = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.[AssessmentCategoryID] = src.[AssessmentCategoryID] ,tgt.[AssessmentCategory] = src.[AssessmentCategory] ,tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = src.[GradingPeriodID] ,tgt.[UserID] = src.[UserID] ,tgt.[CreatedBy] = src.[CreatedBy] ,tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE() ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBy ,tgt.extCalendarSessionID = src.CalendarSessionID ,tgt.[GlobalID] = [src].[GlobalID] ,tgt.AssessmentFamilyID = src.AssessmentFamilyID ,tgt.AssessmentFamily = src.AssessmentFamily ,tgt.PublishItem = src.PublishItem ,tgt.PostToFamilyAccess = src.PostToFamilyAccess ,tgt.PostToStudentAccess = src.PostToStudentAccess ,tgt.PublishResults = src.PublishResults ,tgt.Adaptive = src.Adaptive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN INSERT (StudentCourseSectionID, SubmittedDate, GradeBookEntryID, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, GradeBookEntryTypeID, Weight, extMaxScore, UserID, extIsActiveSession, extActiveCourseSection, extIsCSY, [RefSchoolStreamID], [AssessmentCategoryID], [AssessmentCategory], [CreatedBy], [ModifiedBy], [GradingPeriodID], GlobalID, extCalendarSessionID,AssessmentFamilyID, AssessmentFamily, PublishItem, PostToFamilyAccess, PublishResults, Adaptive, PostToStudentAccess) VALUES (src.StudentCourseSectionID, COALESCE(src.Submitteddate, GETDATE()), src.GradeBookEntryID, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), src.GradeBookEntryTypeID, src.WeightMultiplier, src.MaxScore, src.UserID, src.extIsActiveSession, src.ActiveCourseSection, 1, src.RefSchoolStreamID, [src].[AssessmentCategoryID], src.[AssessmentCategory], [src].[CreatedBy], [src].[ModifiedBy], [src].[GradingPeriodID], src.GlobalID,src.[CalendarSessionID], src.AssessmentFamilyID, src.AssessmentFamily, src.PublishItem, src.PostToFamilyAccess, src.PublishResults, src.Adaptive, src.PostToStudentAccess)
OUTPUT $action, inserted.*, deleted.*; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Student scoresheets have been successfully prepared'
-- 15th April 2024 UPDATE sgbe SET extSGID = sgbe.StudentGradeBookEntryID from StudentGradeBookEntry sgbe where sgbe.extSGID IS NULL and extIsActiveSession = 1

/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID

_controller = MiniFeeReminder _view = mini_bill_statement _template = MiniFeeReminder_mini_bill_statement.rdlc

businessRules.rule: set @BusinessRules_EnableResultSet = 1 -- Enable caching of the result set. Duration is specified in seconds. -- set @BusinessRules_ResultSetCacheDuration = 30

WITH cte_student_fees AS ( SELECT sf.PersonID, sf.EffectiveFrom AS Date, (sf.FeeAmount - ISNULL(sf.Discount, 0)) AS Debit, 0 AS Credit, f.Description, '' AS NameOfPayee, ft.FeeType, '' AS FeeNote, --sf.EffectiveDate AS BillDate, COALESCE(curr.Code, 'GHS') AS Currency, SUM((sf.FeeAmount - ISNULL(sf.Discount, 0))) OVER (PARTITION BY sf.PersonID) AS TotalAmountBilled, 0 AS TotalAmountReceived, f.EffectiveDate AS EventDate, 'F' AS OPS, sf.FeeID FROM student_fees sf LEFT JOIN Fees f ON sf.FeeID = f.FeeID LEFT JOIN zlkpFeeType ft ON f.FeeTypeID = ft.FeeTypeID LEFT JOIN zlkp_currency curr ON curr.CurrencyID = f.CurrencyID -- WHERE sf.PersonID = 13039 ),
-- Continue with the next CTE(s) as needed...
cte_fee_collection_transaction AS ( SELECT fct.PersonID, fct.TransDate AS Date, 0 AS Debit, fct.Amount AS Credit, fct.Description, fct.NameOfPayee, fct.FeeType, fct.Description AS FeeNote, fct.TransDate AS BillDate, a.code AS Currency, 0 AS TotalAmountBilled, SUM(fct.Amount) OVER (PARTITION BY fct.PersonID) AS TotalAmountReceived, fct.TransDate AS EventDate, 'P' AS OPS, fct.FeeID FROM fee_collection_transaction fct OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP 1 * FROM zlkp_currency curr WHERE curr.IsDefault = 1 ) a -- WHERE fct.PersonID = 13039 ),
-- Continue with the final query that joins the two CTEs... cte_fee_combined_bill_collection AS(
SELECT sf.PersonID, sf.FeeID, sf.Debit, fct.Credit, sf.Description, sf.FeeType, CAST(sf.EventDate AS DATE) AS EventDate, sf.Currency, (sf.Debit - fct.Credit) AS LineBalance, 1 AS State FROM cte_student_fees sf LEFT JOIN cte_fee_collection_transaction fct ON fct.PersonID = sf.PersonID AND fct.FeeID = sf.FeeID --WHERE sf.PersonID = 13039
UNION ALL
SELECT sf.PersonID, '' AS FeeID, SUM(sf.Debit) AS Debit, SUM(fct.Credit) AS Credit, '' AS Description, '' AS FeeType, '' AS EventDate, sf.Currency, (SUM(sf.Debit) - SUM(fct.Credit)) AS LineBalance, 2 AS State FROM cte_student_fees sf LEFT JOIN cte_fee_collection_transaction fct ON fct.PersonID = sf.PersonID AND fct.FeeID = sf.FeeID --WHERE sf.PersonID = 13039 GROUP BY sf.PersonID, sf.Currency ) SELECT aa.PersonID ,aa.FeeID ,p.FirstName ,p.LastName ,p.IdentificationCode ,aa.Description ,aa.FeeType ,aa.EventDate ,aa.Currency ,aa.Debit ,aa.Credit ,aa.LineBalance ,aa.State ,p.CurrentYearGradeLevel ,ss.SessionCode ,s.SchoolName ,s.Address ,o.Website ,o.Email ,o.Logo FROM cte_fee_combined_bill_collection aa
INNER JOIN Person p ON p.PersonID = aa.PersonID INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON opr.PersonID = p.PersonID INNER JOIN StudentSchoolAssociation ssa ON ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID = opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID INNER JOIN zlkpGradeLevel zgl ON zgl.RefGradeLevelId = ssa.RefEntryGradeLevelId INNER JOIN Session ss ON ss.CalendarSessionID = ssa.CalendarSessionID INNER JOIN Calendar cal ON cal.OrganizationCalendarId = ss.OrganizationCalendarId INNER JOIN [School] [s] ON [cal].[SchoolID] = [s].[OrganizationID] INNER JOIN [Organisation] [o] ON [s].[OrganizationID] = [o].[OrganizationID]
--WHERE ----(ExitWithdrawDate IS NULL OR ExitWithdrawDate >= GETDATE()) -- (V 0.2) ----cal.CurrentSchoolYear = 1 --and -- aa.PersonID = 13030 -- (V 0.2)
set @BusinessRules_EnableResultSet = 1 -- Enable caching of the result set. Duration is specified in seconds. -- set @BusinessRules_ResultSetCacheDuration = 30
set @BusinessRules_EnableResultSet = 1 -- Enable caching of the result set. Duration is specified in seconds. -- set @BusinessRules_ResultSetCacheDuration = 30

--======================================================= -- update organisation logo --=========================================================
UPDATE m SET Logo = '' FROM master_student_grades_gradebooks_p4 m INNER JOIN Organisation P ON P.OrganizationID = m.OrganizationID WHERE m.Isactive = 0
update m SET Logo = P.Logo FROM master_student_grades_gradebooks_p4 m INNER JOIN Organisation P ON P.OrganizationID = m.OrganizationID WHERE m.Logo IS NULL SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Updating school logo for reporting completed!!!'

--======================================================= -- update organisation logo --=========================================================
UPDATE m SET Logo = '' FROM master_student_grades_gradebooks_p4 m INNER JOIN Organisation P ON P.OrganizationID = m.OrganizationID WHERE m.Isactive = 0
update m SET Logo = P.Logo FROM master_student_grades_gradebooks_p4 m INNER JOIN Organisation P ON P.OrganizationID = m.OrganizationID WHERE m.Logo IS NULL AND m.Isactive = 1
SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Updating school logo for reporting completed!!!'

--======================================================= -- update organisation logo --=========================================================

update m SET Logo = P.Logo FROM master_student_grades_gradebooks_p4 m INNER JOIN Organisation P ON P.OrganizationID = m.OrganizationID WHERE m.Logo IS NULL AND m.Isactive = 1
SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Updating school logo for reporting completed!!!'

--======================================================= -- update photos and organisation logo --========================================================= UPDATE m SET Logo = null FROM master_student_grades_gradebooks_p4 m INNER JOIN Organisation P ON P.OrganizationID = m.OrganizationID WHERE m.Isactive = 0
update m SET PhotoUrl = P.PhotoURL FROM master_student_grades_gradebooks_p4 m LEFT JOIN Person P ON P.PersonID = m.PersonID WHERE m.PhotoUrl IS NULL SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'updating student profile photos to central repo completed!!!'

update.Data:
/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN UPDATE SET tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.SubmittedDate ,tgt.Weight = src.WeightMultiplier ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.MaxScore ,tgt.extIsActiveSession = src.extIsActiveSession ,tgt.[extActiveCourseSection] = src.[ActiveCourseSection] ,tgt.extIsCSY = CASE WHEN src.extIsActiveSession = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.[AssessmentCategoryID] = src.[AssessmentCategoryID] ,tgt.[AssessmentCategory] = src.[AssessmentCategory] ,tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = src.[GradingPeriodID] ,tgt.[UserID] = src.[UserID] ,tgt.[CreatedBy] = src.[CreatedBy] ,tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE() ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBy ,tgt.extCalendarSessionID = src.CalendarSessionID ,tgt.[GlobalID] = [src].[GlobalID] ,tgt.AssessmentFamilyID = src.AssessmentFamilyID ,tgt.AssessmentFamily = src.AssessmentFamily ,tgt.PublishItem = src.PublishItem ,tgt.PostToFamilyAccess = src.PostToFamilyAccess ,tgt.PostToStudentAccess = src.PostToStudentAccess ,tgt.PublishResults = src.PublishResults ,tgt.Adaptive = src.Adaptive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN INSERT (StudentCourseSectionID, SubmittedDate, GradeBookEntryID, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, GradeBookEntryTypeID, Weight, extMaxScore, UserID, extIsActiveSession, extActiveCourseSection, extIsCSY, [RefSchoolStreamID], [AssessmentCategoryID], [AssessmentCategory], [CreatedBy], [ModifiedBy], [GradingPeriodID], GlobalID, extCalendarSessionID,AssessmentFamilyID, AssessmentFamily, PublishItem, PostToFamilyAccess, PublishResults, Adaptive, PostToStudentAccess) VALUES (src.StudentCourseSectionID, COALESCE(src.Submitteddate, GETDATE()), src.GradeBookEntryID, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), src.GradeBookEntryTypeID, src.WeightMultiplier, src.MaxScore, src.UserID, src.extIsActiveSession, src.ActiveCourseSection, 1, src.RefSchoolStreamID, [src].[AssessmentCategoryID], src.[AssessmentCategory], [src].[CreatedBy], [src].[ModifiedBy], [src].[GradingPeriodID], src.GlobalID,src.[CalendarSessionID], src.AssessmentFamilyID, src.AssessmentFamily, src.PublishItem, src.PostToFamilyAccess, src.PublishResults, src.Adaptive, src.PostToStudentAccess)
OUTPUT $action, inserted.*, deleted.*; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Student scoresheets have been successfully prepared'
-- 15th April 2024 UPDATE sgbe SET extSGID = sgbe.StudentGradeBookEntryID, extSCID = sgbe.StudentCourseSectionID from StudentGradeBookEntry sgbe where (sgbe.extSGID IS NULL or sgbe.extSCID is NULL) and extIsActiveSession = 1

/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN UPDATE SET tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.SubmittedDate ,tgt.Weight = src.WeightMultiplier ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.MaxScore ,tgt.extIsActiveSession = src.extIsActiveSession ,tgt.[extActiveCourseSection] = src.[ActiveCourseSection] ,tgt.extIsCSY = CASE WHEN src.extIsActiveSession = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.[AssessmentCategoryID] = src.[AssessmentCategoryID] ,tgt.[AssessmentCategory] = src.[AssessmentCategory] ,tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = src.[GradingPeriodID] ,tgt.[UserID] = src.[UserID] ,tgt.[CreatedBy] = src.[CreatedBy] ,tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE() ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBy ,tgt.extCalendarSessionID = src.CalendarSessionID ,tgt.[GlobalID] = [src].[GlobalID] ,tgt.AssessmentFamilyID = src.AssessmentFamilyID ,tgt.AssessmentFamily = src.AssessmentFamily ,tgt.PublishItem = src.PublishItem ,tgt.PostToFamilyAccess = src.PostToFamilyAccess ,tgt.PostToStudentAccess = src.PostToStudentAccess ,tgt.PublishResults = src.PublishResults ,tgt.Adaptive = src.Adaptive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN INSERT (StudentCourseSectionID, SubmittedDate, GradeBookEntryID, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, GradeBookEntryTypeID, Weight, extMaxScore, UserID, extIsActiveSession, extActiveCourseSection, extIsCSY, [RefSchoolStreamID], [AssessmentCategoryID], [AssessmentCategory], [CreatedBy], [ModifiedBy], [GradingPeriodID], GlobalID, extCalendarSessionID,AssessmentFamilyID, AssessmentFamily, PublishItem, PostToFamilyAccess, PublishResults, Adaptive, PostToStudentAccess) VALUES (src.StudentCourseSectionID, COALESCE(src.Submitteddate, GETDATE()), src.GradeBookEntryID, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), src.GradeBookEntryTypeID, src.WeightMultiplier, src.MaxScore, src.UserID, src.extIsActiveSession, src.ActiveCourseSection, 1, src.RefSchoolStreamID, [src].[AssessmentCategoryID], src.[AssessmentCategory], [src].[CreatedBy], [src].[ModifiedBy], [src].[GradingPeriodID], src.GlobalID,src.[CalendarSessionID], src.AssessmentFamilyID, src.AssessmentFamily, src.PublishItem, src.PostToFamilyAccess, src.PublishResults, src.Adaptive, src.PostToStudentAccess)
OUTPUT $action, inserted.*, deleted.*; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Student scoresheets have been successfully prepared'
-- 15th April 2024 UPDATE sgbe SET extSGID = sgbe.StudentGradeBookEntryID, extSCID = sgbe.StudentCourseSectionID from StudentGradeBookEntry sgbe where (sgbe.extSGID IS NULL or sgbe.extSCID is NULL) and extIsActiveSession = 1

/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN UPDATE SET tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.SubmittedDate ,tgt.Weight = src.WeightMultiplier ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.MaxScore ,tgt.extIsActiveSession = src.extIsActiveSession ,tgt.[extActiveCourseSection] = src.[ActiveCourseSection] ,tgt.extIsCSY = CASE WHEN src.extIsActiveSession = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.[AssessmentCategoryID] = src.[AssessmentCategoryID] ,tgt.[AssessmentCategory] = src.[AssessmentCategory] ,tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = src.[GradingPeriodID] ,tgt.[UserID] = src.[UserID] ,tgt.[CreatedBy] = src.[CreatedBy] ,tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE() ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBy ,tgt.extCalendarSessionID = src.CalendarSessionID ,tgt.[GlobalID] = [src].[GlobalID] ,tgt.AssessmentFamilyID = src.AssessmentFamilyID ,tgt.AssessmentFamily = src.AssessmentFamily ,tgt.PublishItem = src.PublishItem ,tgt.PostToFamilyAccess = src.PostToFamilyAccess ,tgt.PostToStudentAccess = src.PostToStudentAccess ,tgt.PublishResults = src.PublishResults ,tgt.Adaptive = src.Adaptive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN INSERT (StudentCourseSectionID, SubmittedDate, GradeBookEntryID, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, GradeBookEntryTypeID, Weight, extMaxScore, UserID, extIsActiveSession, extActiveCourseSection, extIsCSY, [RefSchoolStreamID], [AssessmentCategoryID], [AssessmentCategory], [CreatedBy], [ModifiedBy], [GradingPeriodID], GlobalID, extCalendarSessionID,AssessmentFamilyID, AssessmentFamily, PublishItem, PostToFamilyAccess, PublishResults, Adaptive, PostToStudentAccess) VALUES (src.StudentCourseSectionID, COALESCE(src.Submitteddate, GETDATE()), src.GradeBookEntryID, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), src.GradeBookEntryTypeID, src.WeightMultiplier, src.MaxScore, src.UserID, src.extIsActiveSession, src.ActiveCourseSection, 1, src.RefSchoolStreamID, [src].[AssessmentCategoryID], src.[AssessmentCategory], [src].[CreatedBy], [src].[ModifiedBy], [src].[GradingPeriodID], src.GlobalID,src.[CalendarSessionID], src.AssessmentFamilyID, src.AssessmentFamily, src.PublishItem, src.PostToFamilyAccess, src.PublishResults, src.Adaptive, src.PostToStudentAccess)
OUTPUT $action, inserted.*, deleted.*; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Student scoresheets have been successfully prepared'
-- 15th April 2024 UPDATE sgbe SET extSGID = sgbe.StudentGradeBookEntryID, extSCID = sgbe.StudentCourseSectionID from StudentGradeBookEntry sgbe where (sgbe.extSGID IS NULL or sgbe.extSCID is NULL) and extIsActiveSession = 1

update.Data:
/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- EXEC [dbo].[usp_ops_withdraw_students_enrollment]

/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- EXEC [dbo].[usp_ops_withdraw_students_enrollment]

/*
Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu Date : 18/02/2024 Description : This script un-enrolls a student who should no longer be on the current enrollment list. Set the WithdrawalDate to a date in the past or current day, MarkedforDeletion = 1
*/
-- Step 1 ================================================================================ -- Set the ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) for MarkedForDeletion = 1 --======================================================================================== UPDATE opr SET ExitDate = COALESCE(ssa.ExitWithdrawDate, GETDATE()) --SELECT * FROM StudentSchoolAssociation ssa INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr ON ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID = opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID WHERE ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 AND ssa.ExitWithdrawDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 2 ================================================================================ -- Set ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate for Person table --======================================================================================== UPDATE P SET ExtendedLiveStatusEndDate = opr.ExitDate , CurrentYearStatus = 'No' -- SELECT * from Person p INNER JOIN OrganizationPersonRole opr on opr.PersonID = p.PersonID INNER JOIN zlkpRole zr on zr.RoleId = opr.RoleID INNER JOIN StudentSchoolAssociation ssa ON opr.OrganizationPersonRoleID = ssa.OrganizationPersonRoleID where ssa.MarkedForDeletion = 1 and opr.ExitDate <= GETDATE()
-- Step 3 ================================================================================== -- Reset the MarkedForDeletion Flag to 0 --========================================================================================== UPDATE StudentSchoolAssociation SET MarkedForDeletion = 0
/* Version Date : Description Author -- 0.1 18/09/2019 This process updates the current selected record and Benjamin Ohene-Adu updates the gradelevel, CurrentYearStatus and the ExtendedRole Benjamin Ohene-Adu -- 0.2 19/09/2019 This stage of the process updates the status of students with a current enrollment record CurrentYearGradeLevel, CurrentYearStatus and ExtendedRole */
-- Step 4 ================================================================================== -- Refresh the Person table and set the attributes for current students --========================================================================================== EXEC [zusp_harmonise_grade_level_groups] SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Update process for CYGs ' + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' ; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The students expiration process ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully' SET @Result_Refresh = 1

command.text: SELECT zlocd.LocationName AS ReceivingLocation, p.ProductName, SUM(st.Quantity) AS TotalQuantity FROM StockTransactions st LEFT JOIN zlkpMovementMode mm ON mm.MovementModeID = st.MovementModeID LEFT JOIN zlkpInventoryLocations zloc ON zloc.LocationID = st.SourceLocationID LEFT JOIN zlkpInventoryLocations zlocd ON zlocd.LocationID = st.ReceivingLocationID LEFT JOIN Product p ON p.ProductID = st.ProductID WHERE st.TransactionTypeCode = 'OUT' GROUP BY zlocd.LocationName, p.ProductName

update.Script: SET @MarkedForDeletion = 0
SET @StockTakeDate = GETDATE()
if @IsVarianceAccepted IS NULL THEN SET @IsVarianceAccepted = 0
if @IsVarianceAccepted IS NULL SET @IsVarianceAccepted = 0

insert.Name: setSystemQuantity
insert.Script: UPDATE st SET st.ProductName = p.ProductName, st.SystemQuantity = p.Quantity FROM StockTake st INNER JOIN Product p on p.ProductID = st.ProductID WHERE p.ProductID = @ProductID

update.Script:
UPDATE st SET st.ProductName = p.ProductName , st.SystemQuantity = ISNULL( st.SystemQuantity, p.Quantity) , st.StockDifference = st.ScannedQuantity - p.Quantity
FROM StockTake st INNER JOIN Product p on p.ProductID = st.ProductID WHERE p.ProductID = @ProductID
SET @Sellable = 0 SET @UnitsOnHold = 0 SET @UnitsOnOrder = 0 --SET @UnitsInStock = 1 SET @IsActive = 1
SET @Sellable = 0 SET @UnitsOnHold = 0 SET @UnitsOnOrder = 0 --SET @UnitsInStock = 1 SET @IsActive = 1 SET @Quantity = 0

update.HeaderText: The behaviour hub provides a one-stop place for managing behaviour reference data.
This Grading Hub provides users with a common place to set up GradeLevels, Streams, and Grade Scales.
This hub helps organise subject experiences provided for the instruction of students on a regular or systematic basis.

/* Date : 28th May 2019 Name : [dbo].[usp_merge_automate_class_section_rosters] Description : This sql script forms part of the process to automate the assignment of students to course sections (class) A prior process creates the view vw_merge_student_coursesections which is used used to update StudentSectionAssociation table Abnormal Assignment Occurrence : Check to ensure the codes for absence RefCourseSectionEnrollmentStatusTypeId is equal to 8 Modified : 02 September 2019 -- added script to refresh child records on update Author : Benjamin Ohene-Adu version Date Desc Author -- 0.2 20/03/2021 tgt.RefSchoolStreamID = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] Benjamin Ohene-Adu -- 0.3 13/06/2021 Added CourseSectionID to capture changes in setup Benjamin Ohene-Adu
-- EXEC [dbo].[usp_merge_automate_class_section_rosters] --SELECT * FROM StudentSectionAssociation tgt */
EXEC [dbo].[usp_merge_automate_class_section_rosters]
SET @Result_ExecuteOnClient = '$appfactory.find("StudentSectionAssociation", "Controller").sync();' SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'The matching process for students ' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(12), GETDATE()) + ' ' + 'has completed successfully'

update.Text:
SELECT [TransactionID] ,[BudgetID] ,BudgetName ,[Category] ,[Description] ,[Date] ,[RecordTypeID] ,[CreatedDate] ,[ModifiedDate] ,[CreatedBy] ,[ModifiedBy] ,[Income] ,[Expense] FROM ( SELECT
iet.IncomeExpenseID as TransactionID ,iet.[BudgetID] ,b.BudgetName ,zec.CategoryName AS Category ,iet.[Description] ,iet.[Amount] ,iet.EventDate AS [Date] ,zec.CategoryID as RecordTypeID ,iet.[CreatedDate] ,iet.[ModifiedDate] ,iet.[CreatedBy] ,iet.[ModifiedBy] ,CASE WHEN zec.Indicator = 'Income' THEN [Amount] END AS [Income] ,CASE WHEN zec.Indicator = 'Expense' THEN [Amount] END AS [Expense] ,zec.Indicator
FROM [IncomeExpense] iet LEFT JOIN Budget b on b.BudgetID = iet.BudgetID LEFT JOIN zlkpExpenseCategory zec on zec.CategoryID = iet.CategoryID ) AS PivotData

insert.Script:
/*********************************************************************************************** Procedure Name : [dbo].[zusp_ops_process_received_purchase_order_all] Description : Automatically processes full goods receipt by setting ReceivedQuantity = OrderedQuantity, and updates StockLevel accordingly.
Parameters : @PurchaseOrderID INT - ID of the purchase order being fully received @ReceivedBy NVARCHAR(100) - Username or ID of person receiving the goods
Created By : ChatGPT Created Date : 2025-04-18 Modified By :
Usage Example : EXEC [dbo].[zusp_ops_process_received_purchase_order_all] 10;
Notes : - Assumes all items in the PO are received exactly as ordered. - Validates against missing or closed orders. - Updates Product and StockLevels accordingly.
************************************************************************************************/
EXEC [dbo].[zusp_ops_process_received_purchase_order_all] @PurchaseOrderID

/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN UPDATE SET tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.SubmittedDate ,tgt.Weight = src.WeightMultiplier ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.MaxScore ,tgt.extIsActiveSession = src.extIsActiveSession ,tgt.[extActiveCourseSection] = src.[ActiveCourseSection] ,tgt.extIsCSY = CASE WHEN src.extIsActiveSession = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.[AssessmentCategoryID] = src.[AssessmentCategoryID] ,tgt.[AssessmentCategory] = src.[AssessmentCategory] ,tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = src.[GradingPeriodID] ,tgt.[UserID] = src.[UserID] ,tgt.[CreatedBy] = src.[CreatedBy] ,tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE() ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBy ,tgt.extCalendarSessionID = src.CalendarSessionID ,tgt.[GlobalID] = [src].[GlobalID] ,tgt.AssessmentFamilyID = src.AssessmentFamilyID ,tgt.AssessmentFamily = src.AssessmentFamily ,tgt.PublishItem = src.PublishItem ,tgt.PostToFamilyAccess = src.PostToFamilyAccess ,tgt.PostToStudentAccess = src.PostToStudentAccess ,tgt.PublishResults = src.PublishResults ,tgt.Adaptive = src.Adaptive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN INSERT (StudentCourseSectionID, SubmittedDate, GradeBookEntryID, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, GradeBookEntryTypeID, Weight, extMaxScore, UserID, extIsActiveSession, extActiveCourseSection, extIsCSY, [RefSchoolStreamID], [AssessmentCategoryID], [AssessmentCategory], [CreatedBy], [ModifiedBy], [GradingPeriodID], GlobalID, extCalendarSessionID,AssessmentFamilyID, AssessmentFamily, PublishItem, PostToFamilyAccess, PublishResults, Adaptive, PostToStudentAccess) VALUES (src.StudentCourseSectionID, COALESCE(src.Submitteddate, GETDATE()), src.GradeBookEntryID, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), src.GradeBookEntryTypeID, src.WeightMultiplier, src.MaxScore, src.UserID, src.extIsActiveSession, src.ActiveCourseSection, 1, src.RefSchoolStreamID, [src].[AssessmentCategoryID], src.[AssessmentCategory], [src].[CreatedBy], [src].[ModifiedBy], [src].[GradingPeriodID], src.GlobalID,src.[CalendarSessionID], src.AssessmentFamilyID, src.AssessmentFamily, src.PublishItem, src.PostToFamilyAccess, src.PublishResults, src.Adaptive, src.PostToStudentAccess)
OUTPUT $action, inserted.*, deleted.*; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Student scoresheets have been successfully prepared'

Parameters : @PurchaseOrderID INT - ID of the purchase order being fully received @ReceivedBy NVARCHAR(100) - Username or ID of person receiving the goods
Created By : ChatGPT Created Date : 2025-04-18 Modified By :

/* Date: 13th Dec 2019 Modification : Amended the update process to ensure only one record per student person s affected Version Date Description Author -- 0.2 14th July 2021 -- 0.3 1st August 2021 Removed extCalendarSessionI as comparison predicate to reduce duplicate Benjamin Ohene-Adu */
--select * from vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src
MERGE StudentGradeBookEntry tgt USING vw_merge_app_current_enrollment_for_gradebookentries src ON tgt.StudentCourseSectionID = src.StudentCourseSectionID AND tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID AND tgt.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] = src.[GradeBookEntryTypeID] AND tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.[RefSchoolStreamID] AND tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = [src].[GradingPeriodID] -- v 0.2 --AND tgt.[extCalendarSessionID] = src.[CalendarSessionID] -- v 0.3
WHEN MATCHED AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN UPDATE SET tgt.GradeBookEntryID = src.GradeBookEntryID ,tgt.SubmittedDate = src.SubmittedDate ,tgt.Weight = src.WeightMultiplier ,tgt.extMaxScore = src.MaxScore ,tgt.extIsActiveSession = src.extIsActiveSession ,tgt.[extActiveCourseSection] = src.[ActiveCourseSection] ,tgt.extIsCSY = CASE WHEN src.extIsActiveSession = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ,tgt.[RefSchoolStreamID] = src.RefSchoolStreamID ,tgt.[AssessmentCategoryID] = src.[AssessmentCategoryID] ,tgt.[AssessmentCategory] = src.[AssessmentCategory] ,tgt.[GradingPeriodID] = src.[GradingPeriodID] ,tgt.[UserID] = src.[UserID] ,tgt.[CreatedBy] = src.[CreatedBy] ,tgt.ModifiedDate = GETDATE() ,tgt.ModifiedBy = src.ModifiedBy ,tgt.extCalendarSessionID = src.CalendarSessionID ,tgt.[GlobalID] = [src].[GlobalID] ,tgt.AssessmentFamilyID = src.AssessmentFamilyID ,tgt.AssessmentFamily = src.AssessmentFamily ,tgt.PublishItem = src.PublishItem ,tgt.PostToFamilyAccess = src.PostToFamilyAccess ,tgt.PostToStudentAccess = src.PostToStudentAccess ,tgt.PublishResults = src.PublishResults ,tgt.Adaptive = src.Adaptive
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET AND src.[GradeBookEntryID] = @GradeBookEntryID AND src.[RefSchoolStreamID] = @RefSchoolStreamID AND src.GradingPeriodiD = @GradingPeriodID
THEN INSERT (StudentCourseSectionID, SubmittedDate, GradeBookEntryID, CreatedDate, ModifiedDate, GradeBookEntryTypeID, Weight, extMaxScore, UserID, extIsActiveSession, extActiveCourseSection, extIsCSY, [RefSchoolStreamID], [AssessmentCategoryID], [AssessmentCategory], [CreatedBy], [ModifiedBy], [GradingPeriodID], GlobalID, extCalendarSessionID,AssessmentFamilyID, AssessmentFamily, PublishItem, PostToFamilyAccess, PublishResults, Adaptive, PostToStudentAccess) VALUES (src.StudentCourseSectionID, COALESCE(src.Submitteddate, GETDATE()), src.GradeBookEntryID, GETDATE(), GETDATE(), src.GradeBookEntryTypeID, src.WeightMultiplier, src.MaxScore, src.UserID, src.extIsActiveSession, src.ActiveCourseSection, 1, src.RefSchoolStreamID, [src].[AssessmentCategoryID], src.[AssessmentCategory], [src].[CreatedBy], [src].[ModifiedBy], [src].[GradingPeriodID], src.GlobalID,src.[CalendarSessionID], src.AssessmentFamilyID, src.AssessmentFamily, src.PublishItem, src.PostToFamilyAccess, src.PublishResults, src.Adaptive, src.PostToStudentAccess)
OUTPUT $action, inserted.*, deleted.*; SET @Result_ShowMessage = 'Student scoresheets have been successfully prepared'
-- 15th April 2024 UPDATE sgbe SET extSGID = sgbe.StudentGradeBookEntryID, extSCID = sgbe.StudentCourseSectionID from StudentGradeBookEntry sgbe where (sgbe.extSGID IS NULL or sgbe.extSCID is NULL) and extIsActiveSession = 1

update.Text:
SELECT [TransactionID] ,[BudgetID] ,BudgetName ,[Category] ,[Description] ,[Date] ,[RecordTypeID] ,[CreatedDate] ,[ModifiedDate] ,[CreatedBy] ,[ModifiedBy] ,[Income] ,[Expense] ,Curr FROM ( SELECT
iet.IncomeExpenseID as TransactionID ,iet.[BudgetID] ,b.BudgetName ,zec.CategoryName AS Category ,iet.[Description] ,iet.[Amount] ,iet.EventDate AS [Date] ,zec.CategoryID as RecordTypeID ,iet.[CreatedDate] ,iet.[ModifiedDate] ,iet.[CreatedBy] ,iet.[ModifiedBy] ,CASE WHEN zec.Indicator = 'Income' THEN [Amount] END AS [Income] ,CASE WHEN zec.Indicator = 'Expense' THEN [Amount] END AS [Expense] ,zec.Indicator ,curr.CurrencyName AS Curr
FROM [IncomeExpense] iet LEFT JOIN Budget b on b.BudgetID = iet.BudgetID LEFT JOIN zlkpExpenseCategory zec on zec.CategoryID = iet.CategoryID LEFT JOIN zlkp_currency curr ON curr.CurrencyID = iet.CurrencyID ) AS PivotData

SELECT [TransactionID] ,[BudgetID] ,BudgetName ,[Category] ,[Description] ,[Date] ,[RecordTypeID] ,[CreatedDate] ,[ModifiedDate] ,[CreatedBy] ,[ModifiedBy] ,[Income] ,[Expense] ,Curr FROM ( SELECT
iet.IncomeExpenseID as TransactionID ,iet.[BudgetID] ,b.BudgetName ,zec.CategoryName AS Category ,iet.[Description] ,iet.[Amount] ,iet.EventDate AS [Date] ,zec.CategoryID as RecordTypeID ,iet.[CreatedDate] ,iet.[ModifiedDate] ,iet.[CreatedBy] ,iet.[ModifiedBy] ,CASE WHEN zec.Indicator = 'Income' THEN [Amount] END AS [Income] ,CASE WHEN zec.Indicator = 'Expense' THEN [Amount] END AS [Expense] ,zec.Indicator ,curr.CurrencyName AS Curr
FROM [IncomeExpense] iet LEFT JOIN Budget b on b.BudgetID = iet.BudgetID LEFT JOIN zlkpExpenseCategory zec on zec.CategoryID = iet.CategoryID LEFT JOIN zlkp_currency curr ON curr.CurrencyID = iet.CurrencyID ) AS PivotData

command.text:
SELECT [TransactionID] ,[BudgetID] ,BudgetName ,[Category] ,[Description] ,[Date] ,[RecordTypeID] ,[CreatedDate] ,[ModifiedDate] ,[CreatedBy] ,[ModifiedBy] ,[Income] ,[Expense] ,Curr FROM ( SELECT
iet.IncomeExpenseID as TransactionID ,iet.[BudgetID] ,b.BudgetName ,zec.CategoryName AS Category ,iet.[Description] ,iet.[Amount] ,iet.EventDate AS [Date] ,zec.CategoryID as RecordTypeID ,iet.[CreatedDate] ,iet.[ModifiedDate] ,iet.[CreatedBy] ,iet.[ModifiedBy] ,CASE WHEN zec.Indicator = 'Income' THEN [Amount] END AS [Income] ,CASE WHEN zec.Indicator = 'Expense' THEN [Amount] END AS [Expense] ,zec.Indicator ,curr.CurrencyName AS Curr
FROM [IncomeExpense] iet LEFT JOIN Budget b on b.BudgetID = iet.BudgetID LEFT JOIN zlkpExpenseCategory zec on zec.CategoryID = iet.CategoryID LEFT JOIN zlkp_currency curr ON curr.CurrencyID = iet.CurrencyID ) AS PivotData

insert.Name: setDefaultCurrency
insert.Script: update Budget SET CurrencyID = curr.CurrencyID, Code = curr.Code FROM Budget CROSS JOIN zlkp_currency curr WHERE curr.IsDefault = 1

update.About: This screen allows users to manage academic calendar, sessions (terms) and grading periods. Your current grading period should be marked as active while previous and upcoming grading periods should be marked as closed (InActive).
A course is instance of a class that's offered at an educational instituition associated with an account.

update.Title: AADI Indicators
update.About: Attendance Anomaly Detection System

An "Attendance Anomaly Detection System" is a proactive mechanism implemented by educational institutions to monitor and identify students who may be at risk of poor attendance or potential academic failure. It utilises various data points related to student attendance, such as daily attendance records, patterns of absenteeism, tardiness, and other relevant factors.

update.About: An intervention plan is an action plan for helping a student build specific skills or reach a goal.
